5,https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10566311,Public Relations Executive,"Belt Road Capital Management (Cambodia) Co., Ltd",Public Relations Executive,Entry Level,1,1,Negotiable ,~,Age Unlimited,"

","Job SummaryThe Public Relations Executive for Prince Horology is responsible in assisting the Relations Executive Manager for developing, implementing, monitoring, and evaluating communications strategy in order to support its communication objectives and maximize positive exposure in both national and international markets. The Public Relations Executive must be able to write press releases, speeches, presentations, and other media materials. He/She must also have a basic understanding of using AI tools such as ChatGPT.What you will do:•
column2: Help develop and execute public relations campaigns and events that build and maintain a positive image for Prince Horology in particular and Prince Holding Group in general.•
column3: Write and edit press releases, feature stories, speeches, presentations, and other promotional materials. •
column4: Assist in managing relationships with media contacts and other third-party suppliers. •
column5: Help in tracking and analyzing media coverage.•
column6: Prepare reports on PR activities and results.","•
column7: Bachelor’s degree in Communications, Journalism, Business Administration or Marketing preferred but not a must.•
column8: Excellent command of English and Khmer (written and spoken), with ability to write clear and compelling materials. English is essential.•
column9: At least 2 years’ experience in a dynamic and changing organization.•
column10: PR/Advertising agency / Media / Journalism experience desirable.•
column11: Have a basic understanding of using AI tools such as ChatGPT. •
column12: Positive outgoing attitude, and ability to work in a multicultural and multilingual environment.","Belt Road Capital Management (BRCM) is a private equity investment manager focused on the Greater Mekong Sub-Region. We partner with Real Estate investors and promising small- and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to support the achievement of strategic goals, facilitate sustainable growth and expand access to markets.",Publish Date：Aug-21-2023,Closing Date：Sep-20-2023,"Contact Information Mr. Sopheara Chhum  085 547 783 recruitment@beltroadcap.com Phnom Penh #282, Corner Preah Monivong Blvd (93) and Oknha men St (200), Sangkat Boeng Raing, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 085 547 783"

","- To establish and encourage a strong relationship with our resort guests and team members and provide accurate and accessible information about the facilities and services we offer.

- To be an ambassador of the Song Saa brand and an example to guests and staff alike offering the highest levels of service and demonstrating strong and confident interpersonal skills on all occasions.
- To assist the Guest Experience Manager to maximise revenue along with the productivity of all team members and identify the most efficient means possible for directing resort information to guests.
- To liaise with all departments to ensure high standard of service for guests, ensuring their experience from start to finish is of the highest standard.
- Provide an accessible management representative for guests, directing all guest comments and feedback to relevant departments.
- Help the Manager to coordinate and manage the duties and responsibilities of the Guest
- Experience Team to ensure that the highest standards of facilities and services are established and maintained.
- Assist in managing the departmental budget and preparing monthly financial reports.","- Qualification in Hospitality or Hotel Management preferable but not essential.
- Minimum two years’ front office experience in hotels or resorts.
- A high level of knowledge of Opera PMS, Excel, Word and Outlook.
- Ability to communicate in both written and spoken English to an exceptional standard. Multi-lingual an advantage.
- Proven track record of great leadership in a team environment.
Interested applicants should submit their CV to talent@songsaa.com

Learn more about Song Saa at www.songsaa.com","Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.",Publish Date：Aug-21-2023,Closing Date：Sep-20-2023,"Contact Information HR Department   078330733 Koh Ouen, Khan Mittapheap  078330733"

Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005.
The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse

column1: ,Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies.

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia.

","To work with the School Leaders and Head of Department, Singapore (Cambodia) International Academy Co., Ltd. (SCIA), a Cambodia registered subsidiary of SIM International Academy Pte. Ltd., The Teacher, Art is reporting to Head of Department and is responsible for:
● Delivering effective Art lessons in accordance with Cambridge and Singapore curriculum standards to students of different proficiencies.
● Ensuring the development of 21st Century skills through the teaching of Art.
● Adopting teaching and learning styles which stimulate student interest and active involvement in learning.
● Designing and implementing effective assessments to monitor academic standards and ensuring that the students’ learning is effective and continuous.
● Coaching students on Art-related projects, performances and competitions
● Reviewing and designing instructional materials based on students’ needs and instructional objectives of the curriculum.
● Developing curricular resources aligned to departmental framework to support students’ learning.
● Caring for and ensuring the wellbeing of students.
● Encouraging and motivating students in character development and values inculcation, in accordance to school values.
● Undertaking relevant roles and responsibilities such as class mentorship and student club mentorship.
● Performing other functions as necessary or assigned by School Leaders and Subject Head.
● Assisting School Leaders and Subject Head in any projects or tasks in relation to School goals and objectives.
● Participating in all School-wide events.","1. Academic Education / Training / Experience
● Degree in Art or related discipline from an internationally recognised university.
● Teaching certification from a recognised institution.
● Strong knowledge in curriculum, pedagogy and assessments.
● Minimum 3 years of working experience in education institutions.
● Experience in teaching in an international setting, as well as familiarity with Cambridge curriculum and Singapore education system, is an advantage.
● A passion for education sector and working with children
● Willing to be stationed in Phnom Penh, Cambodia
● Willing to work flexibly in dynamic and fast-paced environment
● Excellent interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
● Strong ability in leadership, networking, teamwork, and problem-solving
● Ability to work independently, as well as in collaboration with others
● Ability to “think outside the box” in identifying problems and implementing solutions
● Works well under pressure, well organised and with strong attention to details

● Ability to multitask and manage tight deadlines","Singapore (Cambodia) International Academy (SCIA) endeavours to be the centre of excellence in education and higher learning. SCIA is a member of the Singapore Institute of Management (SIM) Group, the leading provider of a diverse range of education pathways and professional training in Singapore. Recognising the importance of nurturing future leaders in Cambodia, SCIA offers the following programmes to cater to the different needs of learners:
With the expertise of trained Singapore and international educators, SCIA provides a holistic and rigorous education with a global perspective.

SCIA is a registered school of Cambridge Assessment International Education, and appointed by the Singapore Examinations and Assessment Board (SEAB) as an Overseas Examination Centre to conduct the Singapore International Primary School Examination (iPSLE). SCIA is also appointed by the University of London as the first and only Recognised Teaching Centre in Cambodia to offer the International Foundation Programme (IFP).

","Job Announcement𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎 𝐂𝐨., 𝐋𝐭𝐝., the parent company of 𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎, 𝐓𝐄𝐍𝟏𝟏, 𝐆𝐀𝐓𝐎𝐍𝐈, 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟑𝟔𝟏° planning to extend across the country, is currently looking for a talented and potential candidate in the position of Senior Fashion Merchandiser.Job Title: Senior Fashion MerchandiserCategory: Fashion, Merchandising, PurchasingJob Summary: Planning and developing merchandising strategies. Analyzing sales figures, customers' reactions, and market trends to anticipate product needs and collaborating with designers, operations, warehouses, and suppliers to negotiate prices, quantities, and time scales.Merchandisers are not fashion designers. He/she stays close to the fashion world and uses their fashion sense and analytical mind to determine how much of each style to purchase and stock, negotiate with manufacturers, and suppliers, and work with fashion designers to determine emerging or existing trends. Job Description:•
column2: Keep up with the latest Fashion trend and communicate regularly with fashion designers in order to blend fashion sense with quantitative analysis by looking at how products have performed in the past and forecast consumer demands for upcoming seasons.•
column3: Use fashion knowledge and trend analysis to decide how to purchase and stock a retail store. Decide which new styles to order, which items to reorder, the quantity of each item, and colors and sizes to stock.•
column4: Purchase and negotiate with manufacturers and designers to make sure items can be priced in a way that will sell and make a profit.•
column5: Determine how each store should be stocked based on store sales performance, different customer demographics, and store environment.•
column6: Prepare budget planning for monthly stock purchases for the upcoming season, and present it to management for approval.•
column7: Schedule timeline from production, to finish product and delivery to ensure on-time for the season.•
column8: Other tasks assigned by Merchandising Manager.","Requirements:•
column9: BA/BS degree in Fashion Design or related field•
column10: 2 years of experience in a product management role•
column11: A strong ability in forecasting, analytical, negotiation, and communication skill•
column12: Understand fashion trend and their demand•
column14: Proficient in MS Office and Adobe Suites •
column16: Strong attention to detail*𝐎𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐛𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬:• Annual Bonus• Employee Discount• Birthday Package• Other benefitsInterested candidates are invited to submit their updated CV, and cover letter to our email: hr@zandokh.com or 𝙏𝙀𝙇𝙀𝙂𝙍𝘼𝙈: 𝟎𝟖𝟏 𝟐𝟕 𝟓𝟑 𝟓𝟑Join us on Telegram for more job opportunities: https://t.me/zandocareer","Founded in early 2015, ZANDO is a Cambodian fashion retail company inspiring your passion of styles and making you experience the world of iconic fashion brands at the value of every buck.

column2: Job SummaryThe land administration officer has the main role in managing the land data report, monitoring the process of transfer of ownership or land tenure until the end, monitoring the land purchase and sale process and preparing all relevant documents to keep and review documents, letters and contracts assigned by management. II.
column3: Duties & Responsibilities1. Record daily entry-exit documents- Record daily entry-exit documents- Prepare daily entry-exit report2. Monitor ownership transfer process- Prepare to send documents to relevant persons for fingerprinting- Liaise with relevant officers and staff to follow up on documents3. Prepare and save files- Scan and organize daily incoming and outgoing files in an orderly manner, both Hard & Soft Copy- Prepare reports and documents related to the transfer of land ownership and the letter of transfer of land tenure in an orderly manner and in accordance with the procedures.- Organize the Folder and name the File Name after each location.- Divide by location, land and story to save- Organize the received documents according to the type of story and in the correct order in both Hard & Soft Copy to make it easy to find in time4. Prepare license application documents- Prepare documents to apply for a license- Follow the license application until you get the license5. Other functions- Request for necessary equipment in the department- Draft Letter of Receipt and Receipt and Other Administrative Letters- Make a report or minutes of the meeting- Perform various functions related to administrative work assigned by the management.","-

98,https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10566405,មន្រ្តីការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស,ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education),មន្រ្តីការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស,Entry Level,1,1,Negotiable ,Male/Female,Age Unlimited,"

",១. ទទួលលិខិតអនុញ្ញាតសិស្ស ( អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល ឬសិស្សដាក់ច្បាប់ សងច្បាប់ដែលសុំតាមទូរសព្ទមុន ដូរវេនសិក្សា ដូរថ្នាក់ សិស្សមករៀនយឺត សិស្សសុំចេញមុនម៉ោង  សិស្សសុំមិនជិះឡានសាលាចេញ សិស្សមិនមានកាតសម្គាល់ខ្លនួន និងខុសឯកសណ្ឋានសាលា ) ក្រោយការដោះស្រាយចប់ជាមួយសិស្សរាល់បញ្ហាទាំងអស់ត្រូវបញ្ចូលក្នុងទិន្នន័យ AIS Student Affairs System ២. រៀនចំបែងចែកកាតសិស្សទៅតាមថ្នាក់នីមួយៗ និងតាមកំរិតសិក្សា ( AIS )។៣. ទទួលការស្នើសុំធ្វើកាតសម្គាល់ខ្លួនថ្មីសិស្សខ្មែរ។៤. ទទួលរាល់ឯកសារសិស្ស ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសងឯកសារជំពាក់ពេលចុះឈ្មោះចូលរៀន។៥. ដកវិញ្ញាបនបត្រថា្នក់ទី៦ ទី៩ និងទី១២ ដែលចេញដោយសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។៦. ដកសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិថ្នាក់ទី១២ ដែលចែញដោយខាងក្រសួងអប់រំ។៧. សម្របសម្រួលការផ្ទេរការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស និងសិស្សសុំដក ឬខ្ចីសៀវភៅសិក្ខាគារិក។៨. សម្របសម្រួលអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស ឬសិស្សស្នើសុំកែតម្រូវ ឈ្មោះ ថ្ងៃ ខែ ឆ្នាំកំណើត ទីកន្លែងកំណើត និងឈ្មោះឪពុក ម្តាយ។៩. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស  ឬសិស្សស្នើសុំកែតម្រូវវិញ្ញាបនបត្របណ្តោះអាសន្នមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ។១០. សម្របសម្រួលអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សសុំប្តូរលេខទូរសព្ទ និងធ្វើការផ្លាស់ប្តូរលេខទូរសព្ទរួចបញ្ចូលទៅក្នុងទិន្នន័យ AIS School Management System។១១. សម្របសម្រួលរាល់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗមកកាន់សាលា   ឬខាងសាលាជាអ្នកណាត់ជួបជាមួយចាងហ្វាង និងអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាសាលា។១២. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស  និងអ្នកអាណាព្យបាលសិស្សក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងសួរព័ត៌មានពីការចុះឈ្មោះចូលរៀន តម្លៃសិក្សា និងធ្វើឯកសារផ្សេងៗនៅផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលដោយសេវាកម្មត្រជាក់ចិត្ត។១៣. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលដោះស្រាយដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិកពេលបាត់សំបុត្រផ្ញើម៉ូតូ។១៤. ជួយសម្របសម្រួល និងទំនាក់ទំនងទៅកាន់មណ្ឌលសុខភាពសិស្សនៅពេលសិស្សឈឺ។១៥. សម្របសម្រួល និងចូលរួមដោះស្រាយសិស្សរៀនជំនាញ និងរៀនកីឡា។១៦. ចូលរួមសម្របសម្រួល   និងដោះស្រាយរាល់សិស្សមានបញ្ហាខុសច្បាប់វិន័យ ឬការស្នើសុំរបស់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សមកកាន់សាលារៀន និងសិស្សបញ្ហាវត្តមាន និងទូរសព្ទច្រលំទៅផ្ទះ។១៧. ដោះស្រាយសិស្សមានបញ្ហាខុសវិន័យសេវាកម្មដឹកជញ្ចូនសិស្ស។១៨. ដោះស្រាយសិស្សដែលមានបំណងប្តូរម៉ោងឲ្យឡានដឹកចេញ ដឹកចូល ប្តូរថ្ងៃជិះឡានចេញ និងចូល ប្តូរតំបន់ជិះចេញ ឬចូល ប្តូរម៉ោងជិះឡាននៅរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ និងរៀនបំប៉ននៅពេលល្ងាច។១៩. ជួយសម្របសម្រួល និងជូនព័ត៌ដល់សិស្សនៅពេលមានការផ្លាស់ប្តូរលេខឡានសាលា។២០. ជួយដោះស្រាយណែនាំសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាមករៀនយឹតច្រើនដង និងចូលរៀនយឺតពេលក្រោយគ្រូមិនបានចូលក្នុងថ្នាក់ចាប់ពីម៉ោងទី២ឡើងទៅ ឬសិស្សបង្ករបញ្ហាក្នុងថ្នាក់។២១. ទំនាក់ទំនងទូរសព្ទទៅកាន់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស   នៅពេលសិស្សមករៀនយឺតពេលរៀងរាល់៦ដង និងសិស្សមករៀនយឺតចាប់ពី៣០នាទីឡើង។២២. ទំនាក់ទំនងទូរសព្ទទៅកាន់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សនៅពេលសិស្សឈឺ  សិស្សមានរបួស ស្នាម សិស្សសុំចេញមុនម៉ោងសិក្សា សិស្សសុំអត់ជិះឡានសាលាចេញ និងមិនបានជិះឡានសាលាចេញដោយមិនមានការអនុញ្ញាតពីការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស។២៣. សហការជាមួយផ្នែកដឹកជញ្ជូន និងអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីអាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់ ក្នុងការរៀបចំបញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្សតាមឡាននិមួយៗ និងទំនាក់ទំនងទៅសិស្សឲ្យបានដឹងព័ត៌មាន។២៤. ចេញលិខិតថ្លែងអំណរគុណរ ចំពោះបុគ្គលិកដែលរើសបានសម្ភារមានតំលៃ។២៥. ជួយក្នុងការសង្រោះបឋមសិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិក។២៦. ទទួលការផ្ញើសម្ភារ និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។២៧. ទទួលចុះឈ្មោះសិស្សានុសិស្សគ្រប់កម្មវិធីរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។២៨. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សម្ភារសិស្សភ្លេចប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា។២៩. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងខែសិស្សមករៀនយឺតពេលជូនប្រធានផ្នែក និងចាងហ្វាង។៣០. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សិស្សខុសឯកសណ្ឋានសាលាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រចាំខែ។៣១. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកក្នុងមួយវគ្គសិក្សាម្តង។៣២. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សរុបលុយកាតប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងសរុបរួមប្រចាំខែនីមួយៗ។៣៣. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សិស្សផ្ទេរការសិក្សា និងដកសិក្ខាគារិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំសិក្សា។៣៤. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សិស្សប្រើប្រាស់ទូរសព្ទ និងគ្រឿងអេឡិចត្រូនិចប្រចាំឆ្នាំសិក្សា។៣៥. ចូលរួមប្រជុំប្រចាំឆមាសទី១ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង និងប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ ឬវគ្គសិក្សារបស់ការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស។៣៦. ទទួលពាក្យដាក់អាហារូបករណ៍សិស្ស ( ទៅបរទេស និងក្នុងស្រុក )។៣៧. ទទួលការ Complain របស់សិស្សជូនទៅខាងចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកដោះស្រាយ។ ៣៨. បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យលិខិតបញ្ជាក់សងឯកសារសិស្សទៅក្នុង Data AIS Student Affairs។៣៩. បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យក្នុងសៀវភៅកំណត់ហេតុសិស្សមានបញ្ហាចូលក្នុង AIS Student affairs។៤០. បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យសិស្សប្រើប្រាស់ទូរសព្ទដៃក្នុងម៉ោងរៀនចូលក្នុង AIS Student affairs។,"• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារទៅលើផ្នែកការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្សច្រើនឆ្នាំ។• មានចំណេះដឹង និងមានក្រមសីលធម៌ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជា Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Power Point, Email និងបណ្តាញសង្គមនានាតាម Internet។• មានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍លើវិស័យអប់រំ។• មានជំនាញសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។• អាចនិយាយ និងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរ និងភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ។• ​មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការផ្តួចផ្តើម។• មានការចូលរួមសកម្មភាពជួយសង្គម និងវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលខ្លីៗ។• មានសមត្ថភាពវិភាគស្ថានភាពរបស់សិស្ស ដោយធ្វើផែនការ អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ។• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ  និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ។","Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005.
The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

100,https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10566407,Senior Legal Officer,KHUN SEA DEVELOPMENT GROUP,Senior Legal Officer,Senior,4,1,Negotiable ,Male/Female,Age Unlimited,"

","Senior legal officer has the main role in the preparation, negotiation and review of documents, letters and contracts required by the company, monitor compliance with laws and regulations related to all business activities in order to mitigate risks, as well as liaise with the competent authorities, lawyers, registration service providers to apply for the relevant license.1.
column2: A strong knowledge in legal translation as well as to be able to review the draft or draft contracts, legal documents, and company’s policy -
column3: Be able to translate well of legal documents from Khmer to English and Vice Versa as the key work performance as required by top management.-
column4: Review the draft or draft the contracts, legal agreements, template documents, company’s policies necessary for the company’s business and update those documents to make it compliant with the updated laws or actual situations.-
column5: Assist in negotiating the terms and conditions in the contracts with other parties and revise based on the mutual agreement of the parties.-
column6: Assist in analyzing the legal issues occurred in the contracts and other legal documents and propose revision or furnish advice to get a correct modification or adjustment. -
column7: Review the arrangement of contracts/documents for the execution by the company's director and relevant persons.-
column8: Ensure the good keeping of all contracts and legal documents and be the point of contact for contractual interpretation. 2.
column9: Monitor legal compliance of company’s business objectives and activities -
column10: Participate in requesting permits and other licenses directly or cooperate with lawyers or other service providers.-
column11: Prepare application forms and supporting documents for license and other relevant permit registration. -
column12: Follow up and contact with related persons regarding the registration process from commencement until completion.-
column13: Check, follow up and renew the validity and ensure the update of those permits and licenses.-
column14: Ensure good keeping of licenses and permits as soft copies and handover the original documents.3. Verify the research about the legal issues and provide legal consultations to line manager-
column15: Study and research about laws, regulations, good practices, and legal issues related to the company’s business.-
column16: Participate in seminars related to legal updates for capacity building and share to teamwork.-
column17: Provide legal consultations to line manager.-
column18: Notify the newly promulgated regulations to line manager.-
column19: Compile the relevant laws and regulations related to company’s activities for the ease of research.4.
column20: Coordinate in solving litigation cases and disputes occurring in the company.-
column21: Participate in the consultation with lawyers and advisors about strategic approaches to the issues.-
column22: Collaborate with lawyers for the handover of evidence and supporting documents.-
column23: Participate in the process of collecting and reviewing statements, documents, and evidence.-
column24: Participate in the process of negotiating, hearing, and other legal procedure.-
column25: Keep in good order of all documents regarding the cases.-
column26: Follow up all procedures of the cases and make a report from the commencement until completion.5.
column27: Assist in the performance of general administrative works in the department.6.
column28: Perform other tasks assigned by management.","-
column29: Education: Bachelor’s degree or Master of Laws Degree-
column31: Knowledge: civil, criminal laws, administration, leadership and interpersonal skills-
column32: Language: Khmer and English (other languages are an advantage)-
column33: Computer literacy: Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel",,Publish Date：Aug-21-2023,Closing Date：Sep-20-2023,"Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 093777890 careers@khunseagroup.com Phnom Penh #217, St. 369, Daeum Meakkloea, Sangkat Chhbar Ampov Ti Muoy, Khan Chbar Ampov, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 093777890"

- Good at English and computer.","Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.
Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services",Publish Date：Aug-22-2023,Closing Date：Sep-19-2023,"Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114"

column2: បើកបររថយន្តជូនប្រធាននាយកប្រតិបត្តិប្រចាំការិយាល័យកណ្តាល។
ថែទាំ និង ជួសជុលរថយន្តជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថា ខ្លួនពិតជាបានត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលប្រេង ទឹក        អាគុយ ហ្រ្វាំង កង់ ជាដើម។
ធានាថារថយន្តត្រូវបានសម្អាត និងថែទាំបចេ្ចកទេសបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
សហការជាបុគ្គលិកនៅផ្នែកផ្សេងៗទៀត ដើម្បីឲ្យធ្វើឲ្យមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អក្នុងការងារ។
ជួយការងាររបស់អ្នកបើកបរដទៃទៀត ក្នុងករណីចំបាច់ និង បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗ។
ការងារផ្សេងទៀតក្រោមការចាត់ចែងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
កម្រិតសិក្សាចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី១២ឡើងទៅ។
មានបទពិសោធន៍បើកបរយ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ និងចេះប្រើ Google Map បានច្បាស់លាស់។
យល់ដឹងពីច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍និងបទបញ្ជាផ្សេងៗនៃ ចរាចរណ៍ផ្លូវគោក និងចេះដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាព្រមទាំងជួលជុលរថយន្តពេលដែលខូចរឺក៏មានបញ្ហានៅតាមផ្លូវ។
អាចទៅធ្វើការនៅតាមខេត្តតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
មានប័ណ្ណបើកបរត្រឹមត្រូវ និងមានសុពលភាព។

163,https://www.camhr.com/a/job/10566470,Internship Opportunities (Marketing) ,Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (Coca-Cola),Internship Opportunities (Marketing) ,Fresh Graduate,~,2,Negotiable ,Male/Female,18 ~ 25,"
","Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd. (The Coca-Cola Company) is opening for Internship Opportunities for the following functions:
2. Commercial Function (Located in Russey Keo Office)
What could you learn from this?
- Collect quantitative and qualitative data from trade marketing
- Support the marketing team in daily administrative tasks
- More to learn from manager assigning task
• At least 3rd year university student in related fields
• Honest and willing to learn new things
• Be able to communicate in English.
• DRIVE INNOVATION: Generate new or unique solutions and embrace new ideas that help sustain our business (encompassing everything from continuous improvement to new product and package innovation).
• COLLABORATE WITH SYSTEM, CUSTOMERS, AND OTHER STAKEHOLDERS: Develop and leverage relationships with stakeholders to approximately stretch and impact the System (Company and Bottler).
• ACT LIKE AN OWNER: Deliver results, creating value for our Brands, our System, our customers, and key stakeholders.
• INSPIRE OTHERS: Inspire people to deliver our mission and 2020 Vision, demonstrate passion for the business and give people a reason to believe anything is possible.
• DEVELOP SELF AND OTHERS: Develop self and support others' development to achieve full potential.
• GROWTH MINDSET: Demonstrates curiosity. Welcomes failure as a learning opportunity.
• EXTERNALLY FOCUSED: Understands the upstream and downstream implications of his/her work. Tracks and shares external trends, best practices or ideas.
• PERFORMANCE DRIVEN AND ACCOUNTABLE: Has high performance standards. Outperforms her/his peers.
• FAST/AGILE: Removes barriers to move faster. Experiments and adapts. Thrives under pressure and fast pace.
• EMPOWERED: Brings solutions instead of problems. Challenges the status quo. Has the courage to take an unpopular stance.

,Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.
By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.

We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.",Publish Date：Aug-22-2023,Closing Date：Invalid date,"Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444"

","• The Housekeeping Supervisor is responsible for daily supervision of the Housekeeping staff, quality service, guest satisfaction and safety.• Supervises cleaning and assists in administration of Housekeeping services in safe and efficient compliance with policies and procedures, brand standards, and federal, state and local regulations.• Promptly reports emergencies, accidents, injuries, missing articles, damage, engineering items and safety hazards to management.• Reports any deviations from policies, procedures, brand standards and regulations to management.• Knowledgeable on hotel facilities and services to assist guests as appropriate.• Ensures all communication containing Company, hotel, brand and guest information is consistent with privacy policies, practices and regulations.• Impresses guests with quality and timely service in a pleasant and friendly manner.","• At least 2-3 years experiences in the role of Housekeeping Supervisor.• Knowledge of housekeeping principles and practices along with proper use of cleaning equipment and supplies.• Ability to effectively and efficiently supervise staff, daily operations and resolve operational problems in compliance with policies and procedures.• Ability to operate a computer, phone and other office equipment.• Attention to details with good organizational and efficient time management skills.• Previous experience of working on a luxury property.• Able to stay on an island","Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.",Publish Date：Aug-22-2023,Closing Date：Sep-21-2023,"Contact Information HR Department   078330733 talent@songsaa.com Koh Ouen, Khan Mittapheap 078330733"

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. Coordinating with production staff to ensure that products are delivered on time and meet quality standards
Maintaining relationships with vendors in order to secure discounts and special offers
Creating marketing campaigns using print materials such as brochures, catalogs, and flyers as well as digital formats such as email blasts and social media posts
Developing budgets for marketing campaigns and recommending spending levels to management
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Graphic design, Media or related field
At least 2 years working experience in related position
Strong ability creative content planning, writing and process
Excellent communicator and compelling presenter with strong written and oral communication skills.
Flexible, able to work independently, set and follow priorities, manage multiple tasks and deadlines effectively.
Knowledge of Digital Media is a strong advantage.
Be able to work under pressure and good at working as a team

column1: All interested candidates are invited to send your CV, a cover letter, school transcript and other relevant documents, to TUBE CAFE CO., LTD at the following address or via email.
- Address: #03, Street 317, Sangkat Boeung Kak I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia

,TUBE COFFEE created by 3 Cambodian Shareholders. Tube is inspired by London’s metro system, the underground TUBE, for which its fast speed, reliable quality, and affordability are world-renowned. Naturally, these are the very essence which Tube coffee strives to be. We aim to bring fast, affordable, and quality services to Cambodia just like our underground counterpart, but in a coffee way. As synonymous as the tube is with London, Tube coffee aims to be the same in Cambodia, simply by being a Khmer brand created in Cambodia and made by Cambodians to compete with foreign brands. By using yellow, we hope to present to the world the warmth, freshness, happiness, optimism, and positivity of the Khmer culture. So, hop aboard and enjoy a smooth ride on the Khmer tube.
